attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When Labour first came they removed Mortgage Tax relief on Mortgages, instantly increasing the cost of repayments. At the time, interest rates had tumbled from double figures to the lowest rates for 40 years giving some justification for ending the relief. 
Now house prices have out stripped earnings forcing many first time buyers out of the housing market.
Bring back the Mortgage Tax Relief to first time buyers and to those on low incomes..
